abstract: The popular producer of hits like “Top Chef” and the “Real Housewives” franchise is taking a big role in front of the camera.
snippet: The popular producer of hits like “Top Chef” and the “Real Housewives” franchise is taking a big role in front of the camera.
lead_paragraph: The crowded world of late-night television will be adding a new and potentially imposing competitor in January. Bravo is turning its increasingly successful “Watch What Happens Live” show, hosted by Andy Cohen, into a five-night-a-week entry at 11 p.m.

headline.main: Bravo Expands Andy Cohen’s Show to 5 Nights a Week
